nodes.text: Zentilo was a male Human who served in the Republic Army during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was stationed aboard Carrick Station.

Zentilo was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 4.0, the Digital Expansion Knights of the Fallen Empire, as a Level 60 Modification Vendor on Carrick Station and a number of worlds.
